docs.title: Introduction
docs.text:
TALISMAN is a Python package for summarizing gene set functions using large language models (LLMs).

It uses the OntoGPT package to interface with LLMs.

docs.title: Citation
docs.text: TALISMAN is described further in: Joachimiak MP, Caufield JH, Harris NL, Kim H, Mungall CJ. Gene Set Summarization using Large Language Models. arXiv publication: http://arxiv.org/abs/2305.13338

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text: Contributions are welcome! One way to get started with contributing to OntoGPT is to submit an issue.
